title: Panty Club
description: Word Count: Over 10,500  A group of four high school sophomores made up of three girls and one boy have an intensely close relationship. They do everything together. Jordan, the only boy in the group, is confronted with a dilemma when one of his friends gives them all matching panties for Christmas and suggests they create a secret club. The four club members will wear matching panties on certain days of the week. How will Jordan react? Will he join the club?  This story is a fun short read that explores Jordan's adaption to hanging out with his friends who are girls and how he adjusts to school and his personal life as he grows up. Will he explore cross-dressing? Is there romance in the air?  Enjoy Daring Diane  Disclaimer This story is a work of fiction. Names, characters, businesses, places, events, locales, and incidents are either the products of the authorâ€™s imagination or used in a fictitious manner. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental.
author: Daring Diane
